title: Cadavaberry bush

properties.value: Cadavaberry bushes are Farming plants grown at level 22 Farming. A cadavaberry bush is grown by planting 1 cadavaberry seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the patch. Payment is 3 baskets of tomatoes and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Cadavaberry bushes are Farming plants grown at level 22 Farming. A cadavaberry bush is grown by planting 1 cadavaberry seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the patch. Payment is 3 baskets of tomatoes and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Cadavaberry seeds gives 18 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the patch, then disease in the patch may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each berry, when picked, gives 7 Farming experience. Checking the plant gives 102.5 farming experience. Once all berries have been picked, the patch will be clear for new crops.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Cadavaberry bush
Level required 22
Patch Bush
Seeds per 1
Payment 3 baskets of tomatoes
Growth time 120 min (6x20 min)
Yield 4+ (varies)
Regrow No

Plant Cadavaberry bush
Crop Cadava berries
Experience
Planting XP 18 xp
Checking XP 102.5 xp
Harvesting XP 7 xp
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Cadava berries1Always[d 1]590
Leaves1Always[d 2][d 3]Not sold0
  1. ^ Only dropped by Grown version.
  2. ^ Requires pruning with (magic) secateurs to cure disease.
  3. ^ Only dropped by Diseased version.

'''Cadavaberry bushes''' are [[Farming]] plants grown at level 22 Farming. A cadavaberry bush is grown by planting 1 [[cadavaberry seed]] in a [[bush patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the patch. Payment is 3 [[Tomatoes|baskets of tomatoes]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Cadavaberry seeds gives 18 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the patch, then disease in the patch may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each berry, when picked, gives 7 Farming experience. Checking the plant gives 102.5 farming experience. Once all berries have been picked, the patch will be clear for new crops.
